metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11102 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The ReadOneJNGImage function in coders/png.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) during JNG reading via a zero-length color_image data structure. It was discovered that GraphicsMagick incorrectly handled certain image files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

notes.Note: ebarretto> Watch out when applying the fix, it introduces a new vuln. See CVE-2017-11139

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-2').
